title: Toki no Daichi
synopsis:
The story is set in a world years after a young adventurer vanquished the dark lord Diabolos and brought peace to the land. With Diabolos' resurrection, the boy sets out to defeat him again, but has not returned. Now his friend and fellow adventurer Kai sets out to find him and see if what he said is true. Journeying with Kai is Izayoi, a mysterious boy who can communicate with demons, and Jend, a dark elf seeking vengeance against Diabolos for the extinction of his race.

(Source: M-U)

title: Sensei, Oshiete Ageru
synopsis:
Four cute stories about young girls' fascinating loves:

1. Dakishimete, Honey!
2. Sensei, Oshiete Ageru
3. I Love My Husband

4. Darling Mania / Virgin Love
A girl and her boyfriend of one month plan to go on an overnight trip to a spring, and she expects that "it" will happen but...

synopsis:

It tells the story behind Rean and Alisa's matching gloves in Trails of Cold Steel.

title: Tsun-Aho no Maid wa Saikyouiku suru Shikanai

alternative_titles.ja: ツンアホのメイドは再教育するしかない

title: Love All Play
synopsis:
Ryou Mizushima enrolls in junior high and joins the badminton club with great vigor. Although the club didn't have a proper coach, Mizushima improved his skills with his own physical strength by the time he participated in the prefectural tournament. Afterwards, he is approached by the Yokohama Minato High School's badminton coach, Ebihara.

Indecisive and timid, Mizushima hesitates to attend such a prestigious school. However, with his elder sister Rika giving him a strong push, he decides to go to Yokohama Minato. Now blessed with a coach and idiosyncratic teammates, Mizushima will gain experience he's lacked till now, and aims to win the inter-high tournament.

(Source: MAL News)

title: Sekai no Teki no Over Spec!

alternative_titles.ja: 世界の敵の超強撃《オーバースペック》!

title: Battle Spirits: Sword Eyes

alternative_titles.ja: バトルスピリッツ ソードアイズ

synopsis:
The story is set 14 years after Atlantia, the largest country in the world of Legendia, was torn apart by riots. The protagonist Tatewaki Tsurugi was secreted away from the chaos at a young age. Oblivious to his true birthplace, Tsurugi grows up as a spirited boy in the neighboring rocky land of Pacifis.

One day, Tsurugi suddenly comes across the Shining Sword, and his great adventure begin. An army of darkness is hunting down the 12 Sword Braves, and as the army pursues Tsurugi, a figure appears before him. Bringer is a Card Battle Droid entrusted with the duty of protecting Tsurugi. Trained by Bringer in the ways of the Battle Spirits combat, Tsurugi joins the other Sword Braves in rising up against the army of darkness with his Key Spirit Shining Dragon.

(Source: ANN)

title: Ouji to Yamori: Shitsuji Kakumei

alternative_titles.ja: 王子とやもり～執事革命～

synopsis:
They're not just ordinary butlers! Of course they look after their Master and those around them, as well as do house chores, act as escorts, companions, and advisers… anything you ask! These people that go beyond the calling of a regular butler are called “Yamori”, protectors of the home.

Toto, a Yamori in training, is currently studying at various noble houses, but the trouble never seems to stop! Through his job as a Yamori, Toto gets to see first hand the political, racial, and class tensions throughout his homeland of Mertole as he becomes involved with a scandal concerning the royal family.

(Source: MU)

title: Chase
synopsis:
Masato is an ordinary high school student, who is friendly and considerate to all around him. He also writes novels under the pen name "Kuroi." One day, a girl named Yamashita Miyu seeks him out, determined to force him to tell her the 'secret' in his novel. Miyu is obsessed with him, and she will go so far as to handcuff him to keep him from getting away from her! Masato's once-peaceful life will never be the same!

(Source: MangaHelpers)

title: Fudanshi Bartender no Tashinami

alternative_titles.ja: 腐男子バーテンダーの嗜み

synopsis:
Souichirou Hibiki is a bartender at a bar in Shonan. He is usually cool and mysterious, but he has a secret he doesn't want people to know: he is a "secret fudanshi otaku," and he is always trying to make the customers who come to the bar for drinks into his favorite coupling, secretly fantasizing about them and worshipping their precious relationships.

During class, he witnesses Kanoe, a clumsy boy covered in injuries, getting hurt. After seeing Satomi's strange reaction to his injuries, Kanoe becomes curious about Satomi and continuously approaches him...

synopsis:
One day, Omori Shizuka, a high school girl who loves to eat and is bullied, discovers the secret that Akira Kurose, aka "Ashura-kun," the only tough yankee at school, enjoys cooking. 

Akira, a delinquent guy, likes a chubby girl for who she is, but he's worried about her health cause she's eating nothing but unhealthy food. The next day at lunchtime, Akira invites Shizuka to the rooftop and asks her to eat his homemade lunch box. He starts making lunches for her so her diet gets better and their romance begins.

However, there is a clause in the contract that he missed when he signed it...! The twins turn out to be the two boys Mutsuki bullied when they were children... so they put a collar on him and spend every day getting their revenge on Mutsuki.

title: Kaidan Loop

Azusa Yuunami doesn't believe in ghosts or curses – but she's more than willing to photograph supposedly haunted locations for her brother's website collecting local spooky folklore as long as he keeps bribing her with sweets. A fateful visit to an abandoned well, however, lands her right in the middle of her own terrifying ghost story. Tracking the mysterious figure appearing in her photographs reveals the true nature of her curse – she must relive the same day over and over again, and her only hope might be the mysterious exorcist who has seen the gruesome ends that await her.

(source: mangamo)

title: 3P Lovers Share House
synopsis:
What happens if a bartender ex-boyfriend (top) x hairdresser (top) x band-man (bottom) do a threesome...?! 3 men in the "top 3 professions you shouldn't date" in a house-sharing love triangle...?!

I'm Atsushi, an easily influenced, struggling musician. My hairdresser, Shiki, asked me: "Why don't you come to live with me and my friend?" He isn't just good at his job, he also knows how to make me feel pampered even when I try to play tough, so I'm attracted to him.

But, his friend turns out to be my ex-boyfriend, Enraku. I was madly in love with him, but he betrayed me and I never wanted to see him again...

"Do you hate me so much...?" he's pushing me against the wall, and I'm about to get overpowered, but...!!?

Chu Yu woke up to find herself in the body of a murdered princess almost half a millennium ago. She soon finds out that whoever wanted her dead was in her mansion. Knowing the history, she also realizes that the owner of her body will soon perish in a historical rebellion.

Now she must defend herself in the depth of a forbidden city while preventing what is to come in her historical timeline.

A palace epic filled with tactical battles and a hint of affection.

After all, she has no intention of becoming the side character who is sacrificed just for the sake of the male protagonist! But during her grand escape, Meia runs into Duke Rakha Aintia, the story's villain, and his two younger siblings. In an unexpected turn of events, Meia is hired as the twins' sitter, but she also happens to attract the duke's attention due to something magical in her touch...

(Source: Tappytoon)

synopsis:
It has been 300 years since mysterious blue mists started flowing out of the earth. All living things have become immortal and injuries heal instantaneously and sickness doesn’t exist. The aging process has stopped and creatures have stayed the same age since they were exposed to the mist.

Paze Diamond is a state chimney worker that maintains the piping system that regulates the flow of the blue mist. He is known in the town as a clumsy and unlucky person. Paze is in search of happiness although he doesn’t know what that really means. About the same time he starts seeing blue birds that only he seems to be able to see, Margaret Howell literally falls out of the sky on him. The beautiful and happy Margaret immediately takes interest in Paze. Could this be the happiness Paze has been searching for?

Only Kuki, the weird roaming doctor, who can treat the most mysterious illnesses, could answer that question, but he is focused on his research, investigating on the disappearance of the turtle nation and on the coming of the tide that will soon submerge Japan. So it begins his trip discovering the tales from the Far East.

synopsis:
Trained fighters known as Bastioners battle against invaders from another world using a mysterious power called Aegis. Aegis can grant people and objects tremendous strength, but people are unable to use it on themselves and must therefore always fight in pairs to give each other power.

Yorino Aratsugu and Yoko Kaminoi are two young girls training to become Bastioners. Yorino used to protect the timid Yoko from bullies, but now Yoko has surpassed her at everything other than combat skills. As the two of them become full-fledged Bastioners, Yorino must fight to keep herself from becoming fully eclipsed by Yoko's talents, while also struggling to understand the more complicated feelings she has for her childhood friend.

On the other hand, we have Nagisa—a natural-born hottie who works as a teacher at an all-boys school and tries hard to hide a certain secret. What will happen when the two start living together?! A food-love-comedy, describing the unlikely cohabitation of two completely different people—a woman with no luck in men and a man with no interest in women—and centered around the topic of "food."

One of them is his junior Yoshitaka Morooka, who used to help the family company, while the other is the former elite home office prince who fell from grace, Masachika Katori. synopsis:
Neither a utopia nor a dystopia, it’s still a world of nations at strife, as dominated by corporations as ever. Technology hasn’t made humans nearly obsolete, but rather bettered us, if you will, attaching to our bodies and even brains as enhancements—for those who can afford it.

Comics artist Shirow Masamune’s vision of our coming society, animated to global acclaim and finally the basis of a major Hollywood production, branches out in five original stories by some of the most beloved SF novelists working in Japan today. A standalone collection, it requires no familiarity with the franchise to be enjoyed but is indispensable for fans for its thoughtful exploration of the series’ implications.

While reality may never become virtual, it will be increasingly networked and augmented. Navigate herein age-old questions about man that will return, not so ironically, in full force: What is the self? Is there such a thing as the soul?

synopsis:
Sara is assistant to the Greek billionaire playboy Alekos. She also has secret feelings for him! Until now, she has lived by her mother's words: "Don't ever trust men." Her mother raised Sara by herself after Sara's father abandoned them, and through the years, those words have almost felt like a curse. Sara wants a change—she no longer wants to be just a boring secretary. So she takes a month off work and transforms into a entirely different Sara, one who completely shocks Alekos. At first he thinks she has a new lover, and yet he can't resist her. In fact, he decides to have her pretend to be his girlfriend, all the while saying that love is useless!

(Source: Harlequin/SB Creative Corp.)

Wataru becomes completely attached, but You is uncertain. One day, when You suddenly catches a glimpse Takaoka's loneliness, he suggests that Takaoka lives with him?!

title: Zyword
synopsis:
In the magical world of Zyword, the kingdom of Araimel has been attacked by the Holy Valstoke Church, which has left the area defenseless and under a deep sleep spell. The only survivors of the tragedy are 14-year-old Princess Lunatia Araimel and her longtime companion, Roddy, both of whom have magical abilities as a Decipherer and a Spell Breaker, respectively. Capable of collecting Spell Balls that make up the magic that exists in the world, Lunatia plans to acquire the Dawn Shield spell that may be able to save everyone.

While up against an enemy goddess, the pair unexpectedly finds an ally among one of the monster soldiers—a boy shrouded with mysterious power and seventy thousand spell markings all over his body. Giving him the name Ride, Lunatia and Roddy bring the amnesiac boy along in their fight against the Goddesses of Chaos all over the land of Zyword.

He is with Hitomi Kawasaki, a university student who has been shot by the masked man. The masked man tells Shuugo to treat Hitomi, and also takes the 64 people in the hospital hostage. Soon, Shuugo and Hitomi try to escape from the hospital, and they encounter mysterious cases one at a time.

synopsis:
Set in the Taishou era, Heigo Kurasawa, the son of a trading company president, reunites with Isamu Sakaguchi, his childhood friend from 10 years ago.

They both used to play together like brothers but now they are master and servant. Heigo is left feeling lonely because of Isamu's now unfamiliar politeness. In order to restore their past relationship, Heigo tries to treat Isamu not as a servant but as a friend instead. However, one day, Isamu discovered old love letters addressed to Heigo from a man. Heigo was upset by this discovery and when Isamu comes to hold him in his arms, he whispers...

"I will never tell anyone about this. So, please let me be the only one you open up to about this worry..."

synopsis:
When Leigh was eighteen, she fell in love with the multi-millionaire Raoul at first sight, and they were married. Their sweet and gorgeous life as newlyweds seemed like a dream... and the young and innocent Leigh was soon entranced with Raoul. But that life suddenly ended. One day, Leigh saw a beautiful woman lying in her bed, and ran out of the house, stricken with despair... It's been five years since then. Leigh's artistic talent was recognized by society, and she is invited to a party as an artist, where she and Raoul are reunited. "You're still my wife, aren't you?" Raoul says, stealing a kiss like it was the most natural thing in the world!

title: Boku wa Tenshi ja Nai yo
synopsis:
After the Great Kanto Earthquake and the World War people are living in difficult times. 

The main character, Kitami Ichizou ran away from his wealthy home along with his maid, and took up a job as a novel writer. One day he receives a mysterious letter about an invitation to a dubious secret club called "Masquerade" where he meets Zakuro, the performer there.
On the other hand he also received another letter from Sister Yurina, a nun working at the orphanage which Ichizou donated in the past to. Yurino's letter gradually reveals a troubling confession about her own hidden side.
What will Ichizou do about these two peculiar cases, what point will he end up? Find out and relive the old times in this S&M novel.

(Source: VNDB)

title: Utsuro naru Regalia
synopsis:
She's a dragon. He's a dragon slayer. And in this world, the Japanese have been wiped out! That day, giant dragons appeared in the sky above Tokyo, and the collapse of the nation of Japan began. With the arrival of monsters called Moju, Japanese people went extinct, and the nation was transformed into a lawless land occupied by armed forces and criminal syndicates. Yahiro is one of the few remaining. Having gained immortality from dragon's blood, he spends each lonely day as a "salvager," transporting artwork out of the uninhabited ruins of Tokyo...until one day, a pair of twin art dealers request that he salvage a particularly powerful and mysterious item.

(Source: Yen Press)

synopsis:
Utahime Fight is a collection of three short stories, all of which are about magical, mysteriously attractive girls and they effect they have on the people around them. 

In the first story, a girl and her two friends (one male, one female) are really magical fighters for something - probably love and justice. 

The second story follows two girls who are magically drawn into the plot of a movie, in which a prince strives to save his mother and his land. After being threatened with their lives, they wake up in the library in school. They have a final scene in which they admit that they love each other and story ends.  

The third story is about a magical creature that enchants a young man and brings love into his life. (description from http://okazu.blogspot.com/2005/03/obscure-yuri-manga_23.html)

synopsis: Short story about a girl named Masaki and her childhood friend Ruo, who annoy her by scaring off all the boys she wants to date. One day she met an old lady, who gave her a magic needle that will make her wish come true.

title: Owarinaki Scenario
synopsis:
Senator's daughter Heather fell in love with the most handsome boy in high school, Joey. Their relationship came to an end when her unexpected pregnancy was discovered by her parents. They are now both adults and engaged to other people, living with the bitter memory of their first love. One day Heather is shocked to find out that Joey became a movie star and he just won an Academy Award. From the podium of the award ceremony, Joey says: "Heather, I still can't forget about you."

(Source: MU)

title: Bartender à Tokyo

alternative_titles.ja: バーテンダー a Tokyo

synopsis: Having finished his training in Paris, Ren Sajima returns to Japan to work as a bartender.

synopsis:
"Exorcists" are the protectors of the human world with sole responsibility to deal with the evil demons that come from the magic world.... Lan Ximing, a normal student, unexpectedly meets a demon named Nilu and a fantastic journey unfolds before them. Here lies an unimaginable tale that is just waiting to be experienced!

(Source: MU)

alternative_titles.ja: 俺たちの入れ替わり生活

synopsis:
Mitsuru Hanahata is the jokester of the class, always singing and bringing smiles to everyone's faces. Conversely, Takuya Daizenji is the aloof, wealthy, and good-looking heir to the Daizenji Conglomerate. Their lives couldn't be any more different, yet the thought "wouldn't life be better if I were him?" is always on their minds. While thinking this one day, they bump into each other and switch bodies!

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Kannou Shousetsu wo Kaku Onnanoko wa Kirai desu ka?

synonyms: Do you hate girls who write erotic novels?
alternative_titles.ja: 官能小説を書く女の子はキライですか?

title: Kunshu no Chikai
synopsis:
Mariah doesn't trust men. It doesn't help that her job has conditioned her to believe that all rich and handsome men are complete jerks, either. When Zayad, a man with the imposing presence of a proud foreign king, practically overflowing with confidence, moves in next door, Mariah can't help but feel hostility toward her new neighbor. However, when she takes a spill in the shower and is left unable to move, the one to hear her cries and come running to the rescue is none other than Zayad himself! He's the last person she wants to see her in this unsightly state! Ignoring her pleas not to enter the bathroom, Zayad mercilessly opens the door...

(Source: Harlequin/SB Creative Corp.)

title: Semi Otoko
synopsis: An anthology containing six unusual, ambiguous and poetic stories

title: Vaizard
synopsis: Soma is a Vaizard, a protector of ancient tombs and their priceless treasures. Young archeologist Asuke hires him, but this routine job turns deadly when an ancient magical relic - capable of destroying the world - is stolen by an evil madman. The Vaizard and the archeologist will have to fight their way through tomb raiders, ancient monsters, mind-controllers and mummies to save the world!

title: Party
synopsis:
Be careful what you ask for in life, you just might get it!

Mamoru and Natsu are now dating after a long courtship. But just because they’re finally together doesn’t mean they can live happily ever after. Watch how things unfold between them and their friends at the university in this story of youth, friendship and (boys) love. (Source: DMP/JUNE)

title: Lost: Ikai no Kemonotachi

synonyms: The tale which a beast weaves with people

synopsis:
Yui Kiryuu is a street performer who relies on (and takes pride in) her beauty and dancing skills. In order to save her friend Cecille, she makes a contract with a creature from another world - a Tinas. Her end of the bargain, however, is the thing she treasures the most...

(Source: Kindan-no Aku)

title: Dokuyaku to Otome
synopsis:
Riyako's dream of a happy marriage is shattered when her 'true love' cheats on her. Heartbroken, she finds herself seduced by the beautiful young Shougo, ending in a night of heated passion. However, what seemed like a spontaneous act turns out to be much more as Shougo and her ex-lover are somehow connected! In her confusion, Riyako can't help becoming more addicted to the seductive poison that knows just what buttons to push to convey innocence or evil (and sometimes, both), and a suspenseful and dangerous love affair ensues.

Included one-shot: Love Future

title: Kitsune no Yomeiri: Fundoshi ni Kakusa Reta Koigokoro

alternative_titles.en: The Fox's Tail: Love Hidden by a Fundoshi
alternative_titles.ja: 狐の嫁入り～褌に隠された恋心～

title: Kieta Fantasy
synopsis:
Our special night together was nothing but a fantasy...

Romance novelist Kristin is struggling to recover from a heartbreak that has caused her severe writer's block. Her mother tries to help her out by taking her to an auction where guests can bid on dates with single men. Although Kristin should feel indifferent to these sorts of things, when a talented campaign advisor named Perry takes the stage, she feels her heart skip a beat. Without thinking, she stands up and bids on him for ten thousand dollars! The two of them lead completely different lifestyles. How will their special night end?

(Source: Harlequin/SB Creative Corp.)

title: Naze Nani Honey?
synopsis: Even though she is only half Japanese, the heroine of this story hates English and doesn't want to speak it or learn anything about it. She was born and raised in Japan, and she is Japanese! But then what happens when she meets a cute Japanese boy who speaks English to her?

title: Nanatsu no Umi Nanatsu no Sora
synopsis:
Tyrian's stepfather (a notorious womanizer) decides to remarry, and his victim is a sickeningly sweet and innocent girl named.... Juliet. But the girl is kidnapped off of Tyrian's ship, first by pirates and then by more pirates in the form of our dashing Luminous Red Benedict. The neatly woven threads of conspiracy which have been supporting Tyrian's life begin to unravel, and he flees to Spain at last. Captain Red redoubles his pursuit.

(Source: Translated Treasures)

alternative_titles.ja: スナオになれよ音無くん

title: The Gamesters
synopsis: The story begins in a 60-year-old high-class apartment building, where a millionaire named Grant lives. One day, the apartment's doorman Howard reaches out to Grant, telling him that he wants to save Erica from the building's sixth floor from a cult. At first Grant will have none of it, until Howard reveals to Grant that he has knowledge of one of Grant's secrets.

title: Parano
synopsis:
This is the world where Kokoha(verbal communicators) and
Yumeha(non-verbal communicators)live.
What is this place where a twin sister and brother are talking with each other...?

title: Toriko to Narite
synopsis:
In the Land of Twelve Gods, everyone has a social class corresponding to an animal, and everyone is able to transform into their class animal at will. The young rabbit girl Rikka is married to the wolf-man Tooma, and the two are madly in love. He is a member of the wolf guards who uphold the law in the Land. This is the story of this happy couple and their adventures.

(Source: Decadence Scans)

title: Eien no Nohara
synopsis: The story follows a fantasy writer and her dog.

title: Oretachi ni Ai wa Nai
synopsis: Wealthy high school girl Mikoto finds herself in an arranged marriage engagement with Itaru, a poor, but handsome and smart classmate. However, Itaru isn't as nice as he seemed when they first met. Could he be after Mikoto for her money? Or does he hate her for it?

title: Hulk
synopsis:
Dr. Araki was a Hiroshima survivor whose parents had died in the blast. As an adult, he moved to Nevada to work on Gamma bomb tests for the U.S. government, but during a countdown Araki spotted teenager Ricky Tenda in the blast zone. Leaving the safety of his bunker to rescue Ricky, Araki told his assistant Igor to hold the count, unaware Igor was a Russian spy; the count continued, and though Araki got Ricky to safety, he was caught in the blast himself and transformed into the raging monster "The Hulk". 

(Source: MU)

title: IEDE GAL NI NAMA NAKADASHI SHIMAKUTTE, SEISHORI DOUSEI HAJIMEMASHITA

alternative_titles.ja: 家出ギャルに生中出ししまくって、性処理同棲始めました

title: Watashi no Keiyaku Kekkon ni wa Uso ga Aru.

alternative_titles.en: There is a Lie in My Contract Marriage
alternative_titles.ja: わたしの契約結婚にはウソがある。

synopsis:
Ugly, penniless, and unloved, 18-year-old Youko Moji is ready to end it all. But as she takes the final leap, a pair of arms drag her back. Youko's savior is Kagami Kirihara, a handsome young man who lives in an expensive highrise apartment. He offers her a strange proposition: enter a contract marriage with him, with the only stipulation being that she must get cosmetic surgery to reflect his ideal partner's face.

Youko takes him up on the offer, and, six months later, she is happily married. However, on the news one evening, she learns of an unsolved murder case from 10 years ago—and the victim has the exact same face as Youko, right down to the mole under her eye. Kagami claims that the victim was his first love, and Youko wants to believe him. But could there be a lie hiding within their contract marriage?

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

alternative_titles.ja: はーとふる ・ ダイナーズ

title: Isshou ni Kurasou
synopsis:
Tech giant M.E.C. needs a show-stopping commercial to open a new chapter after five years of miraculous growth. President Shibata gets told their success lies in the hands of a beautiful, kind of rude model named Hazuki. Shibata's skeptical but one angelic smile completely wins him over—to the point of him offering Hazuki a 100-million-dollar contract! Little do either of them know the shockwaves that Hazuki's response will bring...

(Source: Fantasista Inc.)

title: OTAKU-KUN SA... KAGE-KYA NO KUSENI SUCCUBUS NI KATTERU TO OMOTTENNO

alternative_titles.ja: オタクくんさぁ…陰キャの癖にサキュバスに勝ってると思ってンの？

synopsis:
When the main character, an otaku, finds out his classmate is a succubus, he needs to play a game with her to keep his life. Can a virgin nerd boy win in a battle of seduction against a succubus?
(Source: Irodori Comics)

title: Akusei Rinpashu de Nyuuin shita Toki no Koto

synonyms: About the Time I Was Hospitalized for Malignant Lymphoma
alternative_titles.ja: 悪性リンパ腫で入院した時のこと

synopsis:
Keigo Shinzou was hospitalized for malignant lymphoma during the coronavirus pandemic. This one-shot chronicles his treatment and recovery and how he came up with the idea for his new series, Hirayasumi.

(Source: MU)

title: Onaho Kyoshitsu

synonyms: Masturbation Classroom - New Term - Pregnancy Preparation Plan for Female Students

synopsis: This time, she fucks the cocky bitch hole until she gets pregnant! A male teacher who was abused at an all-girls school gets his hands on a mysterious masturbator... a fascinating masturbator that connects to all kinds of female holes! 17 female students in the class plus the female teacher are remotely fucked by seeding! Even if they get pregnant, it doesn't end... (Source: FANZA translated)

title: Koisuru Cosmos
synopsis:
Nohara, a girl of age 15 from an orphanage, is hired by a family of five good-looking brothers. But something was very weird about these Yamashita brothers. Actually, the Yamashitas are aliens!

(Source: MU)

title: A Love Guard
synopsis:
It's about four people. A young police man who joined the force so he could beat people up legally. While he was on the join he messed up and was almost fired but instead was given the job of body guard. So now he has to live like a teen again. the second one is a kid who was raised to take over a large business till they found the real heir. He then became the servant of the new heir. the third one is the new heir. She used to be a normal girl who was orphaned at a young age but was soon found to be the heiress. She used to be normal but the power and money twisted her head and made her a spoiled brat who doesn't care about anyone but her self. The last one is a biker gang's boss. She has a thing for rules and is rather strong. Though her appearance is the total opposite of her strength. She was the reason why the police man almost got fired. She has an odd way with people and can easily persuade them. She is also a body guard for the rich heiress though the reasons are unknown.

(Source: Mangahere)

title: Solfège ~Sweet Harmony~

alternative_titles.ja: ソルフェージュ Sweet harmony

synopsis:
Based on the video game. Kagura returns to her old school after three years abroad, eager to play the forterre with her old tutor again.

(Source: Lililicious)

title: Kimono-chan to Lolita-chan

alternative_titles.ja: 着物ちゃんとロリータちゃん

synopsis: Two schoolmates meet on the street and are surprised by each other's casual clothes.

title: Luoxiaohei Zhaj Ji
synopsis:
A cat spirit, while stealing the framed Heavenly Bright Pearl, was injured heavily by Diting and turned back into a cat. While wandering the streets, he was adopted by Luo Xiaobai, and became Luo Xiaohei. Their story begins now.


(Source: MangaDex)

title: Majo to Boku
synopsis: A romantic slice of life in full color!

title: Loaf App
synopsis:
When country boy Yewang enrolls at the prestigious Yeonghwa Academy to follow his favorite idol Jena Lee, he expects a life of glitz and glamor among Korea's future elite. But he's in for a rude awakening when he finds himself at the very bottom of the social ladder upon his arrival and targeted by the school bullies. Not only that, bullying seems to be normalized at Yeonghwa Academy, with victims designated as "Loafs," who are essentially free targets. Finding allies along the way, Yewang sets out to fight back against his bullies and the school's strict hierarchy.

(Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Ousama to Boku
synopsis:
The plot centers around a boy named Morio who has the IQ of a 6-year-old and his childhood friend who tries to get him to fit into society.

(Source: Wikipedia)

alternative_titles.ja: 新ビッグ・マグナム黒岩先生

title: Platinum Sonata

synonyms: Seiya no Usagi ni Negai wo Komete

synopsis:
Teru loves ice skating, but he had to give up on his dream of becoming a figure skater when he was young due to economic reasons. Now he works at a skating rink, where he has a fateful encounter with Izumi, a boy with a natural gift in ice skating and a candidate to win a medal at the next Olympics. Izumi's coach takes note of Teru's abilities, and tells Teru to practice with Izumi. Does Teru still have a chance to become a professional figure skater?

(Source: Clairparfait)

Included one-shot: Seiya no Usagi ni Negai wo Komete

title: The Little Lady Tames the Leads

synonyms: The Young Lady Tames the Male Leads
alternative_titles.en: The Little Lady Tames the Leads

synopsis:
Emille Serron lives a peaceful life as the daughter of a marquess—that is, until she realizes she's a background character in a novel! In anticipation of the tumultuous events to come, Emille devises a plan to score brownie points with each of the protagonists. That way, no matter how things turn out, she'll be able to continue living her life in comfort. However, her plan backfires as the leads begin to fight for her friendship. Will Emille be able to live the quiet life she dreams of living?

(Source: Tapas Media)

alternative_titles.ja: プリンセス・プリズン!
